refnamediv.refpurpose: Retrieves program information from currently loaded soundfont.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Iterates through the current soundfont for program information. Information is passed to a string array.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: SPrograms[] -- String array of program information
ienginenum -- engine number assigned from fluidEngine

refsect1.title: Examples
refsect1.para:
Here is an example of the fluidInfo opcode. It uses the file fluidInfo.csd and sf_GMbank.sf2.
Example of the fluidInfo opcode.
See the sections Real-time Audio and Command Line Flags for more information on using command line flags.

refsect1.title: See Also
refsect1.para: More information on soundfonts is in the Floss Manuals: https://flossmanual.csound.com/midi/reading-midi-files
For other information on soundfonts look in the Wikipedia: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Soundfont

refsect1.title: Credits
refsect1.para: Rory Walsh, based on Steven Yi's fluidLoad opcode.
